Class BatteryBox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.component.Component
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.component.BatteryBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BatteryBox extends Component
Represents a battery container component that stores energy units used to power other components.
See Also:

    • BatteryBox

      public BatteryBox(Map<Direction,ConnectorType> connectors, int maxBatteryCapacity)
      Constructs a BatteryBox component with specified connectors and maximum battery capacity.
      Parameters:
      connectors - a map associating directions with connector types
      maxBatteryCapacity - the maximum number of battery units this battery box can hold

    • getGuiHash

      @NotNull public @NotNull Integer getGuiHash()
      Description copied from class: Component
